column3: @laanwj Um.... you realize this still have a FIXME in it, waiting for @luke-jr to tell me what version I should put in the release notes...\n
That can be added in later (any time before the 0.12 release), I don't want to hold up a documentation pull for ages.\n
Should we mention something about SPV clients here?\n
Given the BIP mentions it, I don't think we need to here.\n
Wouldn't it be sufficient to just use libblkmaker >= 0.5.1? Remove the "FIXME"?\n
Sure, but if Luke-Jr is going to release a backport, I'd like to know!\n
